line.originaltext: 1 large carrot, peeled and thinly sliced

line.originaltext: Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat.

line.originaltext: Stir in the onion, bell pepper, carrot, and garlic, and cook 5 minutes, until tender.

line.originaltext: Stir in the onion, bell pepper, carrot, and garlic, and cook 5 minutes, until tender.

Mix in 1 can black beans and chicken broth.

line.originaltext: Mix in 1 can black beans and chicken broth.
In a blender, puree remaining can of beans until smooth.

cook(ing22, t0, ing23, "boiled soup", "bring to boil")

line.originaltext: Mix in ham, cumin, salt, and pepper.

line.originaltext: Mix in ham, cumin, salt, and pepper.
